page.title: 05GRAFFHAM HALF-MARATHON
page.content: A half-marathon is over 13 miles. The route is between Seaford College, Graffham, Selham, and Heyshott finishing at the college. It was run to raise money for Duncton recreation ground. 1200 competitors entered this year, but not all of them finished. Those who did got a medal. You need T-shirts and shorts. You may need to run with someone else for encouragement. You run for fun and fitness. The best weather to run in is cloudy. A drink is important because it prevents dehydration. You have to be careful not to do too much too soon. The heat can be another problem on the day. My dad ran and goes out training at 5 p.m. daily, after work.
